long_description: Unlike other Umbrella rigs, our new Panther Martin Vivif surgical tube umbrella rig comes with 8 surgical tubes - 4 with special bend teasers, 4 with special bend swimming action hooks. Features center Pather Martin swim bait trailing 12 inches behind surgical tubes.  The surgical tubes with bent hooks and teasers offers tremendous wiggling, wobbling action and great durability against tail hungry fish. The center swimbait attracts the largest fish. A great feature of this umbrella rig is that the Panther Martin minnow can be changed in seconds for other color or size Vivifs or surgical tubes with hooks.
